fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you can Call in Reinforcements once, which revives a dead Redcoat player and gives them powerful defense and hang immunity tomorrow.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Additional 1 night delay before escaping.
- Upon escaping, can bring any Redcoat with you to escape as well.
- Can talk to Redcoats at night, including after escaping.
- Access to "Volleyfire" factional ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Escape with all Redcoats. If a single Redcoat dies, the condition becomes kill everyone who opposes the king.
